title: "Bundestagswahl 2021 Results from Die Zeit"
---

### NOTE: this data does NOT represent the official vote count and may differ from it.

This repository provides access to  election results data on the Wahlkreis level, scraped from the German newspaper ["Die Zeit"](https://www.zeit.de/politik/deutschland/2021-09/wahlergebnisse-bundestagswahl-2021-wahlkreise-karte-deutschland-live).

Check the `data` folder and retrieve the csv or rds file you want. Note: this will be updated every few hours and every iteration this file will be overwritten.
